children.value: html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}

props.code: local ext_table = require("__yafla__/scripts/extended_table.lua")

children.value: This function take in input a table and tells you if the table is empty or not!
it you have a table that work as a

props.code:
function extended_table.is_empty(tbl)
    if #tbl > 0 then
        return false
    end

    for _, _ in pairs(tbl) do
        return false
    end

    return true
  end

children.value: This function take in input a table and a value and tells you if the element is present in the table!
This just avoid you to write the for loop each time...

props.code:
function extended_table.is_present(tbl, element)
  for _, v in pairs(tbl) do
      if v == element then
          return true
      end
  end
  return false
end

children.value: This function take in input a table, first element of the slice, last element of the slice, step of the slice.
This just avoid you to write the for loop each time...

props.code:
function extended_table.slice(tbl, first, last, step)
  local sliced = {}

  for i = first or 1, last or #tbl, step or 1 do
      sliced[#sliced+1] = tbl[i]
  end

  return sliced
end

children.value: check if the input parameters are correct, so if you insert value that does not match yout table it will crash.
